body.html:p: I'm a graduate of Texas State University and a current senior software engineer at Google (any views expressed here are my own, etc. etc.). My professional experience is primarily in firmware development and testing, hardware bring-up, system design, and custom software development infrastructure. I have varying levels of experience in several fields, some closely related to my professional work and some less so, including electrical engineering, computer architecture, programming language theory, category theory, control theory, operating systems, and FPGA development.
Some of my old work is hosted on my GitHub page (https://github.com/sjolsen), but little if any of it is likely to be of practical use.
I may start a blog here if I ever get around to learning web development beyond the static hand-written HTML and CSS you see here.

I can be reached at stuart@sj-olsen.com. I check this inbox relatively infrequently, so it may be a while before I get back to you. No job solicitations, please. Messages relevant to my work at Google should be directed to my corporate e-mail address.
